benchmark_details.name: TempAnswerQA
benchmark_details.overview: TempAnswerQA is a benchmark distilled from Test of Time and TempTabQA, consisting of questions requiring numerical, temporal answers to evaluate models beyond exact match.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating temporal reasoning in LLMs using specialized regression-based metrics.

data.source: Questions sampled from existing temporal QA benchmarks (Test of Time and TempTabQA).
data.annotation: Manually annotated expected answer formats and temporal units.

methodology.calculation: Mean absolute errors calculated and scaled by mean absolute deviation of the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Lower values of sMAPE and MASE indicate better model performance.
